correspAction.settlement: 2 Loretto Villas, Bray, County Wicklow, Ireland

lg.l: I find that my husband Mr Desmond Fitzgerald, left Mount joy Prison, on Friday last so that he could not have received my 1 letter before his departure. I had been told at the Prison that he would be able to write me and to receive one letter within the first week. I waited to write him till I should have had his letter which came on Friday morning: I posted my reply on Friday after noon.
I have just heard from him again from Dartmoor : it appears they are permitted to write once and receive a letter after arrival there.

I think it very likely that my letter to my husband was forwarded on from Mountjoy in which case he fears that it may count as the letter he has the right to receive in Dartmoor. I shall be very much obliged if you will write the Governor of Dart moor explaining matters so that he may be given the letter which I am now writing him to Dartmoor. As the he will not have another letter for four months I am anxious that he should not lose this one through a mistake.
